page.title: 07Hospital Broadcasting.
page.content: The Hospital Broadcasting Service links all the hospitals on the island. On Sunday nights there is a children's programme when they play records for the children and organise a quiz for them as well.Sometimes the quiz is records played at a faster speed and they have to guess what the record is. There is another children's programme on Wednesdays when the children are in bed. First they play records which the children choose then they have stories for the 5-7 year olds and then the 8-15 year olds.Sometimes people go there and sing and play for the patients. Children from Northwood County Primary School go there and sing every Christmas and at other times.
